Articles.Content: I didn't know where exactly to post this idea but I feel as if a useful piece missing for those of us obsessed with orbital vessels is an orbital trajectory map. Much like the one on http://www.isstracker.com/ for the ISS. Can someone please implement?

SCANsat does that actually. It displays a map with your orbit\trajectory in it.

If you apper to have a seriously inclined orbit like ISS has, you will get similar orbit curves over your map.
